column7: tag of rafsi; it makes one following rafsi a sumti.
column8: Note that sometimes a space or a pause is necessary before and/or after the rafsi. The parser zantufa-0.14 and later will parse ra'oi as in selma'o RAhOI ( http://guskant.github.io/gerna_cipra/zantufa-0.14.html ). Examples: ra'oi.cra .i ra'oi.cac .i ra'oicai .i ra'oicacy .i ra'oi.gismy .i ra'oigismu .
